plot: Luke happens into a spiritualist's shop where he is smitten by her daughter. He decides to stick around and take a job there.
title: Luke, Crystal Gazer
plot_es: Luke happens into a spiritualist's shop where he is smitten by her daughter. He decides to stick around and take a job there.
plot_en: Luke happens into a spiritualist's shop where he is smitten by her daughter. He decides to stick around and take a job there.
